entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-0057: .NET Security Feature bypass Vulnerability #291

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android][arm] System.Numerics.Tensors.Net8.Tests time out on Andrid arm #96923
  • [Android][arm] Package net.dot.System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests could not be assigned a valid UID #96922
  • XmlCompiledTransform.Load throws a System.PlatformNotSupportedException on iOS with .NET 8 #96920
  • Crossgen2 PDB generation regressed after a refactoring in .NET 8, rendering the output PDB invalid. #96917
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IZero and IOne interfaces #96915
  • Unified Build behavior control update for emsdk #96909
  • Use attribute xml for security attribute stripping #96907
  • Unified Build control update for cecil #96908
  • BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGeneration intermittent test failures #96904
  • Undefined behavior should not be invoked when a ComObject marshaled by UniqueComInterfaceMarshaller<T> is used after calling FinalRelease #96901
    9.0.0
  • Unable to use Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator with non-Debug configuration #96900
  • Make Type.IsGenericType and GetGenericTypeDefinition() JIT intrinsics (and JIT time constants) #96898
  • JIT: Consider canonicalizing loops whose header is the beginning of a try #96887
    Future
  • Stateless vs Stateful LibraryImport native marshaller initialize backing variables differently #96886
  • Build time regression on Linux #96884
    9.0.0
  • `XmlNode.Prefix` should have `[AllowNull]` #96882
    Future
  • Solution with IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification and TransactionCompletion against a promoted transaction to MS-DTC #96881
  • [6.0] Test failure in System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.Writing3MBBase64Bytes(formatted: True, skipValidation: False) #96879
    Future
  • [JIT] PerfScore includes code size impact? #96878
    9.0.0
  • CollectionsMarshal.AsSpan assertion failure in System.Text.Json tests #96876
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [wasm] AOT: System.Numerics.Tensors.Net8.Tests - aot-instances.dll with exit code 137 #96865
  • Streaming JsonSerializer buffers all content of skipped JSON properties. #96559
    9.0.0
  • Some tests in `parseTest` are never run. #96679
  • System numerics abort at System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator.Multiply #94610
    9.0.0
  • Unable to break on callback from unmanaged thread #89292
    9.0.0
  • Library trimming steps should support feature switch substitutions #95429
    9.0.0
  • Concurrency issue in TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(type) #30024
    Future
  • TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(object instance) is not thread-safe #92394
    Future
  • Change corelib to resx, strongly typed resources, and split resources for \shared #7643
    Future
  • [JIT] Asm difference for F# and C# methods #58941
    Future
  • Consider rebuilding loop table after loop cloning #62615
    Future
  • Certain loops do not get recorded in optLoopTable #43713
    9.0.0
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96116
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Extend Immutable Collection with Update function #96810
  • Reliability issue on ARM64 Stage1 #86929
    9.0.0
  • Port Device Guard hardening #11874
    Future
  • [7.0] IJW build failure #96730
    7.0.x
  • [Hot Reload] metadata.c:1326, condition `GINT_TO_UINT32(idx) < table_info_get_rows (t)' not met #93860
    8.0.x
  • Bring back proper allocator usage assertion. #12052
    Future
  • ICorDebugRegisterSet2 does not support register with more than 64 bits. #12120
    Future
  • Debug info for promoted structs #12369
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ContainsAny{Except} path to SearchValues #96924
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [perf] Use HybridGlobalization as default and only option for Apple mobile platforms #96918
    tenet-performance, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Remove uses of FCThrow in interlocked helpers #96916
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log to Vector64/128/256/512 #96913
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add `[AllowNull]` to XmlNode.Prefix #96912
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [mono] Enable NativeToManaged wrappers to get compiled with LLVM #96910
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix nativeaot-outerloop #96906
    area-System.Linq
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix class initialization spurious wakeups #96905
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • [mono] [tests] Set error for mono_fullaot runtime tests when no suitable tests are found #96902
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][debugger] fake bind_static_method #96899
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Make startup hooks kind of work with native AOT #96894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] 32-bit platform ObjWriter and bit rot fixes #96890
    NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging tests #96883
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Cse metrics #96880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Reduce asm size of CollectionsMarshal.AsSpan" #96877
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Merged

  • Remove IBC and Ngen related structures and comments #96867
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Exclude System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests from wasm aot until #95791 is resolved #96875
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Fix class initialization spurious wakeups #96903
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILLink: Allow interface methods to not have newslot #95571
    Servicing-approved, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use a sorted module order for metadata generation #96168
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Make sorting of modules more stable in the compiler #96167
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Explicit zeroing for stackalloc if inlined into a caller without LocalsInit #96220
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Disable CI job: Android x64 Release AllSubsets_Mono_RuntimeTests #96891
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix performance of System.Security. Cryptography.Tests #95310
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Factor reachability sets and base them on new DFS #96892
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that JSON properties can be skipped without buffering their entire contents. #96856
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Fix assertion at System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator.Multiply #96744
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Preserve debug info for merged returns #96870
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid copy action for root assemblies #96363
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add Arm64 encodings for SVE IF_SVE_CX_4A_A to IF_SVE_HT_4A group #96214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add non-portable RID to list of known runtime packs instead of overwriting #96858
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix concurrency issue in TypeDescriptor GetProperties() and GetConverter() #96846
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96261
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Clear less memory in object writer #96893
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Replace arm64 with riscv64 #96889
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unroll newly recognized loops #96752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Align newly recognized loops #96756
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix processing `--substitutions` #96834
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Clone newly recognized loops #96754
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Adjust genRangeCheck for handling integer length stored in 6… #96621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove helperframe marshal #96860
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [libs] Skip AdvSimdEncode on Mono #96829
    area-System.Buffers

Updated

  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.2
  • JIT ARM64: Add IF_SVE_DT_3A, IF_SVE_DU_3A, IF_SVE_DX_3A, IF_SVE_DY_3A #96201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Pass field's owner to getFieldType #96794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #96388
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #96514
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Gen0 segment should always be reported as Gen0 for DacHeapWalker #96861
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Crossgen2 PDB generation (again) #96566
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95218
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, blocked, needs-author-action, 6.0.27
  • [release/7.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96808
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96578
    area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95217
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, blocked, needs-author-action, 7.0.16
  • [release/8.0-staging] ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #96847
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/8.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96838
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] Fix debug lazy loaded assemblies when webcil is enabled #96825
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96577
    area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-author-action
  • Timespan int overloads #95779
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0` PR #96459
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • JIT: Allow BBJ_COND false target to diverge from bbNext in layout optimization phase #96609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change allocation of `MethodData` structures to do less unnecessary work #96857
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix assertion at System.Numerics.BigInteger.Parse #96746
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Hardware accelerated implementation of Quaternion multiply #96624
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Implement remaining unimplemented APIs for Builder types #96805
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [browser] remove legacy js interop #96841
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Added designated output instruction emitters #96741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Use whole assembly name when looking for already loaded assemblies #96018
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Optimize BigInteger.CompareTo() #96835
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • -warnnotaserror does not work for warning NU1605 #37972
  • Rollback file based workload update fails to upgrade from 8.0.100 to 8.0.101 #37958
    8.0.1xx
  • [NETE2ESDK][MAC][Linux] With NET 9 alpha SDK installed, the maui-android workload manifest version should update to 9.0 after running ‘sudo dotnet workload update’ #37971
  • [NETE2ESDK][MAC][Linux]The welcome text should not keep showing up when running dotnet workload with sudo privilege. #37952

Closed

  • Unable to use `[env:key=value]` directive with 8.0.100 #37686
  • dotnet 8 SDK uninstalls dotnet 7 #36990
  • dotnet watch test doesn't run tests in dotnet 8 #34949
    8.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the workload feature band #37974
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unneeded strings from an error message #37973
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update manifests when rolling back for install after updating from rollback file #37966
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads, 8.0.2xx
  • Install manifests for rollback after update --from-rollback-file #37965
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2352720 #37964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #37954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #37953
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Re-enable env var directives in the .NET CLI #37827
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 8.0.2
  • Stabilize Branding #37967
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the more test frameworks #37925
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37955
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2352100 #37948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (6.0) #37793
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove TaskWithAssemblyResolveHooks #37913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] [Wasm] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for wasm projects #37900
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (7.0) #37794
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Handle HTTP 403 Forbidden in Containers #37660
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [WIP] Check PublishSelfContained #37693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Compute SdkAnalysisLevel Property at the beginning of the SDK Targets #37778
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822
  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Interceptors open issues for C# 13 #7835
  • Disallow method parameter conversion of `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` #7820

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The .editorconfig option for end_of_line does not work with format document #71616
  • Integration tests are not monitoring the real VM build we shipped #71610
  • IDE0305 produces invalid code for Add/AddRange #71607
  • Add MinimumSeverity to FixAllContext #71605
  • Nullable Warning when custom Equality Operator is used to generate an Expression Tree #71603
  • `NullableWalker.ReachableBottomState` doesn't behave as the overridden member doc comment describes #71602
  • "System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not find System.Private.CoreLib.dll" in Release-mode MAUI application #71600
  • Update roslyn syntax list constructs to support collection expressions. #71596

Closed

  • Add Compilation parameter to EmitBaseline.CreateInitialBaseline (breaking change) #70413
  • Removing Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler #71024
    17.10
  • InvalidProgramException when returning a ref field assignment in a property #71369
    17.10
  • EnC: Avoid completion of non-updated symbols #70212
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Only use ReadyToRun on Release builds #71622
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [cherry-pick] Fix build definition #71621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP: Merged todd #71620
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Unify linked documents when creating preview workspaces #71619
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't create the InheritanceMarginTagger for preview views. #71618
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Classification caching. #71617
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle the 'WSL is not installed' error #71614
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support producing a collection expression constructed from other spreaded collection expressions #71611
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add IDisposable to KeyValueLogMessage #71608
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure thread-safety in aggregated telemetry #71606
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify the work with generated BoundNodes and emit the xml comments as doc comment in the generated code file #71601
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Include buildhost deps.json #71597
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Harden some codepaths from producing null #71595
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Revert "Merge pull request #71412 from vibeeshan025/main" #71612
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ignore the exception from IntraTextAdornmentTagger #71615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [cherry-pick] Fix build definition #71613
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Params Collections: Add a bunch of PROTOTYPE comments and a couple of VB tests. #71598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Move to 8.0 #71507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update MSBuild.StructuredLogger #71576
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix build #71609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `features/roles` #71588
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove `ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler` #71579
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix ref field load in assignment #71566
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71594
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove properties from DocumentSpan #71587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71624
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71623
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update ILVerify bits #71544
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Preserve the whitespaces when rewriting an inheritdoc #71589
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fixes nested code actions in LSP bug #71456
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add severity filter to Fix All operations #71486
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #71592
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Core test #71590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unify how we pass and choose pools #71584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update code to use collection expressions #71591
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disallow `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` method parameter conversion #71531
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Start local function analysis in unreachable state #71506
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Move to value-tasks in asset lookup #71360
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Turn Semantic Snippets off by default #71583
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Separate the process of creating an event accessor parameter and the process of figuring out its type. #71497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Fix rethrowing in nested async catch #71578
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update other BCL to 8.0.0 #71516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support adding routes in Blazor apps with hot reload #53340
  • How to cache static files in blazor .net 8 #53338
  • How Redirect To Not Found Without Change Url In Blazor .Net 8 #53337
  • Blazor: add support for beforetoggle event #53336
  • Redis output caching garbage collection routine should create an Activity to represent its work #53335
  • F5 doesn't compile child Razor Component Projects #53334
  • ASP0023 warning is incorrect #53333
  • UseAuthorization does not work with WebHostBuilder on .NET 8 #53332
  • Not all libraries are publishing a grpc server with mongodb when using the 'Trim unused code' option checked #53331
  • There are multiple .NET runtimes present, so a default dispatcher could not be resolved. Use DotNetObject to invoke .NET instance methods. #53330
  • How to publish on Azure .NET 8 Blazor Web App with Interactive Auto on CLI? #53329
  • You must install .NET to run this application. #53328
    Discussions
  • Invalid auto-generated code when publishing with PublishTrimmed=true #53326
  • Unhandled ChannelClosedException while debugging #53325
  • Grafana dashboards by dotnetteam are not working without fixing metrics names #53322
  • Perf improvement: caching, plainTextWithFilter #53320
  • [Feature] JS colocation without config #53319
  • microsoft.aspnetcore.components.webview v8.0.1 nuget BUG #53318

Closed

  • [Blazor] Supplying a `null` parameter value to an interactive root component causes a `NullReferenceException` on enhanced navigation #52434
    8.0.x
  • Perf improvement: mvc #53311
  • Perf regression: json, mapaction #53312
  • ForbidResult results 200 status code instead of 403 #53244
  • Injecting DBContext in Validation Attribute randomly throws error: "Cannot access a disposed context instance" #53114
  • Disable Refresh Page When Post Form In Blazor #53241
  • Blazor WebAssembly app keeps re rendering component #53287
  • Dotnet 8.0 issue on app with mixed razor and blazor #53133
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #53277

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Allow `null` parameter values to be supplied to interactive components via enhanced page update #53342
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Avoid fetching new page content when only the hash changes #53341
    area-blazor
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dddb219` to `7c07a86` #53323
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Blazor] Allow `null` parameter values to be supplied to interactive components via enhanced page update #53317

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Databinding errors on ListView - What am I doing wrong? #19873
  • ReturnType API for SearchBar like for Entry #19872
  • MenuFlyoutSeparator is not working on MacCatalyst #19870
  • Add cross-platform lifecycle events #19869
  • Picking a lot of files with FilePicker is extremely slow on Windows, and can raise access exceptions on iOS #19868
  • Label FormattedText fails to display html text when populated via binding #19867
  • [iOS] UICollectionView ScrollsToTop does not work #19866
  • Increase Test Coverage UI/manual tests for Essentials #19862
  • NavigationPage: BarBackgroundColor, BarTextColor and Title not updating #19859
  • iOS Debug cannot start but build and deploy works #19858
  • Enable Device Testing on Mac Catalyst using Mac Idiom #19856
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] For D3 pages, periods can be entered with more than 5 characters. #19853

Closed

  • [ci] Builds are failing with different xharness versions #19864
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [iOS] Hardware keyboard in FormSheet disturbs content sizing #19245
    Backlog
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling with Star-sized grid row #18354
    .NET 8 SR2
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - Entry Next Editor #17588
    Backlog
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling UITesting #17559
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Unable to request android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS #19658
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [Mac Catalyst] Setting CancelButtonColor on SearchBar has no effect when using Mac Idiom #18110
    Backlog
  • [net7.0 / net8.0] [iOS] Memory leak when the CollectionView uses CollectionChanged and when adding a CollectionView to a Page makes it and the entire page live forever #14654
  • Images in html from assets displaying in WebView are not displayed on Android and iOS #19189
    Backlog
  • Label with TextType="Html" will crash on Windows if html is invalid. #17457

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [ci] Don't install xharness globally #19863

  • [Windows] Show the Raw HTML for Html Label in case of error #17470
    area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration

Updated

    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856

    area/docs 📓, area/layout 🔲
  • Fix Android MediaPicker Photo capture logic #19844

    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change T4-generated file name for scaffolded entities #32804
  • SqlServer FillFactor for PK is missing #32803
  • Getting System.InvalidOperationException: 'The 'Point' property '{0}' could not be mapped to the database type 'geography' #32802
  • EFC Tooling always forces a rebuild #32801
  • EF core tries to update Alternate Key SQL identity column. #32800
  • Same reference type instance shared by multiple entities is only saved to the last entity's JSON column #32799
  • Contains in LINQ queries - invalid escape character #32798
  • Updating the reference to Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.1.1 to 5.1.4 #32797
  • ThenInclude with Select unexpected behavior #32796
  • How to Get Case Sensitive Primary Keys #32794

Closed

  • EF Core 8 - Oracle - Ignore Case Sensitivity in Primary Key Column Leads to Incorrect Data Loading #32751
  • Unable to "Add Migration" or "Update" a code-first EF Core database when my database code is in a separate project #32692
  • Entity Framework Core in Visual Studio 2022 Migrations freezes (hangs) during migrations (example Add-Migration) #32693
  • Why is my code causing Foreign Key Constraint errors on BulkSaveChanges()? #32795

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/8.x] Produce uncorrelated IN for Contains with nullable item (#32575) #32764
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2

Updated

  • Don't discover DbFunctions when building ad-hoc model #32790
